Author: Ledgit
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] LEDGIT - Rediscover the Origin
Body: LEDGIT  WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | GITHUB | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM | TELEGRAM  A Blockchain-as-a-service (BaaS) platform offering transparent provenance solutions for authentication and legacy heritage solutions with the integration of Smart Application Platform, Smart Contracts & Smart Reward System.  Our Vision Our vision is to create an interactive ecosystem where the provenance of anything with value is a common part in the everyday lives. We foresee a platform whereby people are very much well-informed of their surrounding when it comes to consumption and are able to connect with each other in a more tactful way by integrating with their lineage history.    Our Mission Our mission is to develop a smart application platform integrated with the blockchain of provenance to enable the tracking and tracing of the origins of goods and products as well as recording of the history of family linages to enable the legitimacy and legacy to be established throughout generations to come.    Our Goals • Short term – LEDGIT focuses on developing the Smart Application Platform(SAP) integrated with the basic tracking and recording functions along with the reward system to    enable users to start exposing to this provenance solutions and be rewarded along the way.  • Long term – LEDGIT focuses on widespread use of the provenance blockchain-integrated SAP for businesses and people all over the globe to establish their legacies in our    interactive and social blockchain-as-a-service(BaaS) platform.  Token Allocation Total supply of ledgit tokens is 1,500,000,000 LDG.  Token Sale - 500,000,000 LDG Reward System - 400,000,000 LDG Founding Team - 300,000,000 LDG Marketing Team - 100,000,000 LDG Advisors & Legal - 100,000,000 LDG Reserved - 100,000,000 LDG  Funds Allocation 30% will go to the Development of Smart Apps and our Smart Contract Blockchain 15% will go to the setting up of systems and servers along with the maintenance and hosting in several countries 15% will go to the business developments and expansion plans 15% will go to management and operations 15% will go to the securities and legal team 10% will go to enhancement of marketing and awareness campaigns  PRE-ICO TIER 2 IS CURRENTLY LIVE!!!  Pre-ICO Tier 1 Sales Period: 5 May 2018 - 31 May 2018 Pre-ICO Tier 1 Allocated Tokens: 50 million LDG Pre-ICO Tier 1 Token Price: 0.05 USD per LDG  Pre-ICO Tier 2 Sales Period: 6 June 2018 - 1 July 2018 Pre-ICO Tier 2 Allocated Tokens: 100 million LDG Pre-ICO Tier 2 Token Price: 0.07 USD per LDG  Large buys will be offered special discounts that can be negotiated personally at info@ledgit.com  Ledgit News Ruby | Kr8tif Express | Backstage | BusinessToday
